participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Liam is a sporty and energetic teenager who enjoys playing soccer, despite not liking it as much as others. He is curious about travel and food.
participant_1.background: i am 13 years old. my brother is older than me. i ride the bus to school. i am on the soccer team.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Sophia is an adventurous food lover with a passion for travel. She enjoys experimenting in the kitchen, even if her cooking skills aren't the best.
participant_2.background: hey there i'm 23 and i love food. i've been traveling the world for a years. i've been trying all types of food everywhere i go. i also like to cook but i'm not very good at it.
